thread.title: Kellyanne Conway on Uproar Over Plugging Ivanka’s Brand: Trump ‘Supports Me 100 Percent’
thread.title_full: Kellyanne Conway on Uproar Over Plugging Ivanka’s Brand: Trump ‘Supports Me 100 Percent’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Kellyanne Conway on Uproar Over Plugging Ivanka’s Brand: Trump ‘Supports Me 100 Percent’
text:
Kellyanne Conway on Uproar Over Plugging Ivanka’s Brand: Trump ‘Supports Me 100 Percent’ by Josh Feldman | 7:41   
Fox’s Martha MacCallum asked Kellyanne Conway tonight to address the uproar today over her comments on the network earlier today about Ivanka Trump and her brand. 
In response to Nordstrom dropping the brand (and President Trump ‘s tweet about it ), Conway encouraged Fox & Friends viewers this morning to buy Ivanka’s goods. 
Obviously there are serious ethical issues there––and House Oversight Committee Chairman Jason Chaffetz agrees ––and Conway briefly addressed the outcry tonight. 
She initially said she had no comment, but MacCallum brought up the House Oversight Committee letter. Instead of addressing what she said this morning, Conway simply insisted that she spoke with the president today and “he supports me 100 percent.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
